explains: n. 正统；正教；正统说法

sentences.en: These ideas rapidly became the new orthodoxy in linguistics.
sentences.cn: 这些观点很快就成了语言学中新的正统观念。

sentences.en: But Old Princeton didn't repristinate every out-dated notion of 17th century Reformed orthodoxy.
sentences.cn: 但是老普林斯顿并没有谴责所有过时的17世纪改革宗正统观念。

sentences.en: The orthodoxy on inflation is certainly shifting.
sentences.cn: 对于通胀的普遍看法也当然正在发生转变。
